name: Mau's Gangstar Life
description:
Mau's Gangstar Life.

Mau's Gangstar Life is a 2D game in TOP View, where the goal is to accomplish the missions ordered by the boss of the city in order to dethrone him.

You will play as Jeck, a new gangster in the city.

You're working for the "Orange Crew", 

Your ennemies are the "Reds"

You will be able to buy weapons with your money and you have a research level! The higher the level, the more you will be searched.
Soon a multiplayer version will be available!  You will be able to create a party and play with your friends!  

-- This is a beta version in developpement ! --
(If the game gets a good launch, a mobile version will be created to play from PC to Mobile ! )

There is also cheat codes !, Join the discord to know them !

https://discord.gg/vRKht4m
